text: == Events == *January 22 – Battle of Ridanieh. The Turkish forces of Selim I defeat the main Mamluk army in Egypt under Touman Bey. *February 3 – Capture of Cairo by the Turks. *First contact of organized western merchants with China. *August 15 – Portuguese merchant Fernao Pires de Andrade met Chinese officials through an interpreter at Pearl River estuary and landed at Hong Kong. *October 31 – Protestant Reformation: Martin Luther posts his 95 Theses on the door of the Wittenberg Castle Church. *Conquest of Riazan by Grand Prince Vasili III of Muscovy. *Selim I, Sultan of the Ottoman Empire conquers Palestine and Egypt, and declares himself Caliph. *Third outbreak of the sweating sickness in England, especially bad in Oxford and Cambridge == Births == *Jacques Peletier du Mans, French mathematician (died 1582) *Henry Howard, Earl of Surrey, English aristocrat (died 1547) * == Deaths == *
